name: Responsive Cactus Website
desc: Responsive Cactus Website Design Using HTML CSS And JavaScript

name: Earthquake(Güvende Kal) App
desc: I developed my Stay Safe(Güvende Kal) mobile application in Android Studio in Java. It is an application that brings together people in need and those who want to help in a single application.

name: Electric Vehicle(ChargeAll) App
desc: I used Java in my ''ChargeAll'' charging station application for electric cars that I developed in Android Studio.

name: E-Commerce(E-Ticaret) App
desc: Full-Stack project, I developed the e-commerce application I developed by participating in Engin Demiroğ camp with Angular using SOLID principles in C# language.

name: Mosque Web App
desc: I developed the admin panel of the Mosque Web application, which I developed for the Presidency of Religious Affairs, in C# .net core. I used Html, Css and Js.

name: Metro İstanbul Chatbot
desc: This study develops a chatbot for Metro Istanbul, leveraging a NeuralNet model and data from Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality. It expands the dataset using GPT technology and integrates Python libraries for natural language processing, enhancing user experience and addressing urban transportation challenges.
